revision.text:
The '''tag''' is a number attached to a [[sector]], a [[linedef]] or a [[thing]]. A thing's tag is generally called a [[TID]]. The tag is used to refer to the tagged sector, linedef or thing through various [[action specials]] and [[built-in ACS functions]]. Several objects may share the same tag, and will be affected by the same effects.
UDMF maps have the ability to have multiple tags per line or sector. Doom and Hexen map formats do not allow this. Things cannot have multiple TIDs regardless of map format.
See [[Sector|this page]]'s UDMF properties section for more information on how to apply multiple IDs to sectors and [[linedef|lines]]. [[Category:Glossary]]
